strings.Profile-Description: GitKraken uses profiles to store your application preferences as well as git config information. The preferences you set after installing are set as your default profile. As a GitKraken Pro user, you can create additional profiles and quickly switch between for your different projects, work environments, etc.
strings.Profile-RequiresPro: Adding or switching profiles requires Pro, click here to upgrade
strings.Profile-Unlock: Unlock profile switching by upgrading to Pro
strings.Profile-SyncChanges: Keep my .gitconfig updated with my GitKraken Profile preferences
strings.Profile-SyncChangesSub: When checked, GitKraken will update your global .gitconfig to match GitKraken Preferences, including commit author name and email, and any GPG settings.

strings.GeneralPreferences-AutoFetchIntervalHelp: In minutes, between 0 and 60 (0 disables auto-fetch). Fetches all visible remotes.
strings.GeneralPreferences-AutoFetchIntervalWarn: If you have many visible remotes, this may impact performance.
If you have many visible remotes, this may impact performance. LFS objects will not be automatically fetched.

strings.GeneralPreferences-LongpathsHelp: By default, Windows only supports file paths less than 260 characters. Enable support for longer file paths.
strings.GeneralPreferences-OptIntoAnalytics: Send usage data about GitKraken to Axosoft
strings.GeneralPreferences-OptIntoBugReporting: Send bug reports about GitKraken to Axosoft
strings.GeneralPreferences-WindowsShPathLocation:
Pointing to sh.exe is only required if you're using Git hooks.
sh.exe can be found wherever you've installed Git for Windows,
which is typically in Program Files\Git\bin.
If you can't find it, you may need to install Git for Windows.
strings.GeneralPreferences-MaxCommitsToShowInGra: Increasing this value may adversely affect performance.
strings.GeneralPreferences-ShowAllCommitsInGraph: Enabling this option may adversely affect performance.
strings.GeneralPreferences-UseExtendedLogging: Use extended logging in activity log

strings.Services-Info: Set up SSH and stay logged in to streamline your experience. GitKraken can even use a different SSH key for each service.
strings.Services-LeaveBlank: We recommend leaving this field blank.
strings.Services-PersonalAccessTokenTooltip: GitKraken can use a personal access token to connect to your enterprise server and streamline operations in-app. Click the to learn how.
strings.Services-ServiceConnectionSuccessfulMess: GitKraken will help you find stuff on {0} when cloning or adding remotes. We'll also use your SSH Config to fetch and push; or you can set up a {0}-specific SSH key right here in the Services menu.
strings.Services-ServiceConnectionSuccessfulWith: GitKraken will help you find stuff on {0} when cloning. We'll also use your SSH Config to fetch and push; or you can set up a {0}-specific SSH key right here in the Services menu.

strings.Services-SSHKeyAdviseInvalid: This key was not found on your {0} account. You can configure SSH settings for GitHub below.
strings.Services-SSHKeyAdviseInvalidOrAdd: This key was not found on your {0} account. GitKraken can try to add the key to {0}, or you can configure a different key below.

strings.GetSupport-FreeUserUpSell: Due to the popularity of GitKraken, we are only able to provide support for GitKraken Pro.
strings.GetSupport-DefaultText:
Summary:

  [A brief sentence describing the issue]

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. [First Step]
  2. [Second Step]
  3. [and so on...]

Expected behavior: [What you expect to happen]

Actual behavior: [What actually happens]

strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteFile: This will delete the "{0}". Are you sure you want to continue?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteFiles: This will delete the selected files. Are you sure you want to continue?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteGitFlowRef: This branch is required for Gitflow, are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteRef: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-Delete1LocalBranchIn: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete 1 local branch in "{0}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteNLocalBranches: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete {0} local branches in "{1}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteAllRefs: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete "{0}" at this node, including remotes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteStash: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete stash with message "{0}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteTagFromRemote: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete "{0}" from "{1}"?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DeleteTagFromAllRemo: This is a destructive operation, are you sure you want to delete "{0}" from your remote repos?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-WouldYouLikeToDelete: Would you like to delete tags named "{0}" from your remote repos?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-UnstageAndRemoveFile: This will unstage and delete "{0}". Are you sure you want to continue?
This will unstage and delete the selected files. Are you sure you want to continue?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-DiscardUnstagedChang: This will discard unstaged changes to "{0}". Are you sure you want to continue?
This will discard unstaged changes to the selected files. Are you sure you want to continue?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-ImmediatelyCommitChe: Do you want to immediately commit the cherry picked changes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-ImmediatelyCommitRev: Do you want to immediately commit the reverted changes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-InitEmptyRepo: Repository '{0}' must have an initial commit to be opened. Do you want GitKraken to make a commit for you?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-MergeConflictStashAn: Merge conflicts detected. To proceed with the merge, you must stash any changes and checkout branch {0}. Do you want to do this now?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-CreateCommitForMerge: Do you want to immediately commit the merged changes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-RebaseRequiresStashA: To start the rebase, you must stash any changes and checkout branch "{0}". Do you want to do this now?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-RebaseRequiresChecko: To start the rebase, you must checkout branch "{0}". Do you want to do this now?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-ResetAll: This will discard all staged and unstaged changes, including new untracked files. Are you sure you want to discard all changes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-ResetFile: This will discard all staged and unstaged changes to "{0}". Are you sure you want to discard all changes to the file?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-ResetFiles: This will discard all staged and unstaged changes to the selected files. Are you sure you want to discard all selected changes?
strings.ConfirmationMessage-PersistConflictToDis: Are you sure you want to save to disk?
strings.UndoRedo-InformationMissing: Undo information is missing - it has likely been garbage collected.

strings.KeyBinding-JumpToPreviousTab: Jump to the previous open tab
strings.NotificationMessage-AlreadyUpToDate: No merge necessary. Branch {1} was not moved.
strings.NotificationMessage-RevertWasNoop: However, the current branch already has all changes from the reverted commit.
strings.NotificationMessage-CherrypickWasNoop: However, the current branch already has all changes from the cherry picked commit.
strings.NotificationMessage-SSHKeyBeingUsed: GitKraken will use this key to talk to {0}. The public key has been copied to your clipboard; please make sure it is registered on your {0} account.
strings.Trial-StartTrialModalTitle: Start a Free GitKraken Pro Trial
strings.Trial-StartTrialModalContent: Start your {0}-Day GitKraken Pro trial now to get access to more features:
strings.Trial-StartTrialModalSubcontent: Learn more about GitKraken features at
strings.Trial-StartTrialModalConfirmButton: Start my GitKraken Pro trial now
strings.Trial-TableFeature1: Work with privately-hosted and self-hosted repositories
strings.Trial-TableFeature2: A powerful merge conflict editor in-app
strings.Trial-TableFeature3: Multiple profiles for work & personal use
strings.Trial-TrialStartedModalContent: For the next {0} days, your Pro trial grants you access to all of GitKraken's advanced features.
strings.Trial-TrialStartedModalSubcontent: Upgrade your account at any time during the trial to avoid losing access to these features when the trial ends.
strings.Trial-TrialStartedModalTitle: Your GitKraken Pro Trial Has Started
strings.Version6LegacyTrial-ModalTitle: Thank You for Being an Awesome GitKraken User!
strings.Version6LegacyTrial-ModalContent1: We have made some changes to the GitKraken Pricing Plans and due to these changes, we are upgrading your account to the GitKraken Individual Plan for {0} days, on us! This upgrade will give you:
strings.Version6LegacyTrial-Feature1: The ability to open private repositories
strings.Version6LegacyTrial-Feature2: Access to the Merge Conflict Editor
strings.Version6LegacyTrial-ModalContent2: You can see our pricing plan changes in this {0}.

strings.Error-KeyAlreadyExistsOnAccount: Key already exists on this account
strings.Error-LoginRedirect: Encountered a redirect when attempting to retrieve user data - please add ${0} to your network's whitelist
strings.Error-OpenRepoInExternalEditorNoRepo: You must have a repository open to open it an external editor

strings.Error-PersistMergeToDisk: Failed to persist merge to disk
strings.Error-PushFailedNoRemote: There is no remote to push to, would you like to add one?

strings.Error-BitbucketServerForbidden: Bitbucket Server: A request was rejected because you or your token has insufficient permissions

strings.Error-RemoteRefusedToDelete: Push failed on {0}: remote branch cannot be deleted
strings.Error-RebaseFailedFromFileLock: Cannot modify one or more files. May be due to file permissions or the file(s) being used by another process. Unlock the file(s), abort rebase, then try again.
strings.Error-RebaseAbortFailedFromFileLock: Cannot abort rebase. May be due to file permissions or the file(s) being used by another process.

strings.ErrorFallback-Message: GitKraken encountered a fatal error. If you enabled bug reporting, this issue has been reported. If not, please consider sending a report.
strings.ErrorMessage-BranchNameConflictsWithDire: Could not create ref "{0}" because its name conflicts with an existing ref
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotApplyStashWhenFilesAr: Cannot apply stash while anything is staged. Stash, commit, or unstage first.
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotDeleteCheckedOutBranc: Cannot delete currently checked out branch. Switch branches first.
strings.ErrorMessage-1ConflictPreventsCheckout:
1 conflict prevents checkout.
Commit, stash, or discard your changes first.
strings.ErrorMessage-NConflictsPreventCheckout:
{0} conflicts prevent checkout.
Commit, stash, or discard your changes first.
strings.ErrorMessage-DiscardSelectionFailedWithR: Could not discard selection for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-InotifyLimitReached: File watching is disabled for this repository. Please increase your inotify limit and reopen this repository.
strings.ErrorMessage-FileWatcherFailedToStart: File watching failed to start for this repository.
strings.ErrorMessage-InvalidSshKey: Configured SSH key is invalid. Please confirm that it is properly associated with your Git provider.
strings.ErrorMessage-SshKeyNotFound: SSH Key not found. Please configure one first in Preferences -> Authentication
strings.ErrorMessage-SshKeyNotSupported: Configured SSH key is in an invalid format. Please ensure that your key is valid and is an RSA-type key.
strings.ErrorMessage-MergeConflicts: There are merge conflicts that need to be resolved
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolFo: Multiple files are currently selected in the Commit Panel
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolWi: No file is selected in the Commit Panel or open in the merge resolution panel
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolFo: More than two commits are currently selected in the graph
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenRepo: Could not find a compatible repository at '{0}'.

strings.ErrorMessage-GitHubEnterpriseTooOld: Your instance of GitHub Enterprise is no longer supported by GitKraken. Please ask your network administrator to update your GitHub Enterprise server.
strings.ErrorMessage-NeedUpgradedPermissions: GitKraken has even better integration with {0} and needs more permissions to continue.
